Reviews.Content: Nice and quiet       Ouer room in the top
Reviews.Author: MariaHeeChristensen

Reviews.Content: OK budget hotel reasonably priced hotel a little walk to shops and not a place to stay for a week (good for a night or two or for those who want to get out and about). Room OK, aircon very efficient, drain smell in our room but it was qiuet. Its a good 20 minute walk to sanur shopping but taxis are plentiful and cheap Breakfast is not a buffet but a selection of choices which were adequate. We used it as a stopover (USD48) and stayed in the superior room (lowest class) so recommend upgrade to garden or pool villa
Reviews.Author: nzbased
